summary: Comprehensive testing of GuessIT app 6 new features: Grid/List animations, Messages dual scroll, Message status tracking, Security hardening, Favorite matches, and Match sharing. Backend APIs 100% functional, Frontend partially working with some authentication-dependent features not fully accessible.

ui_bugs.issue: Bookmark icons not visible on match cards even after user authentication
Favorite heart icons not visible on match cards even after user authentication
Vote buttons not clickable - timeout on click events, may be disabled or have overlay issues

integration_issues.issue: After successful registration and login, user menu/profile navigation not available
Messages page not accessible via navigation (direct URL also fails)
Settings page not accessible via navigation (direct URL also fails)

passed_tests: Backend: Football API returns 120 matches with correct structure
Backend: User registration and authentication working
Backend: Favorite matches CRUD (GET/POST/DELETE) - all endpoints functional
Backend: XSS input sanitization working (script tags removed)
Backend: Message conversations endpoint returns data
Backend: Message unread count endpoint functional
Frontend: Homepage loads with 120 match cards
Frontend: Grid/List view toggle animation works (300ms transition detected)
Frontend: Registration flow accessible with proper form fields
Frontend: Vote buttons present (240 home vote buttons found)
Frontend: GUESS IT buttons present on match cards
action_item_for_main_agent: Critical authentication state issues: 1) User authentication not properly reflected in frontend after login 2) Protected routes (Messages, Settings) not accessible 3) Authenticated features (bookmark icons, favorite hearts) not showing 4) Vote buttons not clickable due to overlay/disabled state. These are blocking core user interactions.
